collectible.title: Amy's Pico Pico Hammer
collectible.text: Amy's Pico Pico Hammer that she can take out at any point for any battle at hand! When Amy isn't using her hammer, it is stored away in Hammerspace. It's just a replica, though, as Amy uses the real one to fight Dr Eggman.
collectible.unlock: Win a game against Amy Rose.

collectible.title: Amy's Speical Photo
collectible.text: We seem to to have gotten quite close. I hope you'll accept this photo of me as a symbol of that. Just please don't show it to anyone else, it's for you only. <3
collectible.unlock: See all three of Amy's butt poses in one game.
